actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law

official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to require prospective employers of H-1B nonimmigrants to participate in an educational, training, or mentorship program for United States workers.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to require that prospective employers of H-1B nonimmigrants participate in an educational, training, or mentorship program to train local U.S. workers in science, math, engineering, or technology related to the position for which an H-1B nonimmigrant is sought.

titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to require prospective employers of H-1B nonimmigrants to participate in an educational, training, or mentorship program for United States workers.
